industries.name: Computer, Optical, Control and Measurement Technology, Radio and Electronics, Automatics (Manufacturing)

experience.description:
Software development for embedded systems.
* Development of a static scheme verification system for CI/CD systems in Python.
* Development of custom software for SOC ESP 32/Nordic/STM32, etc.
* Development of custom software for Windows OS in VS C#/Qt 6 C++/Python development systems.

Responsibilities: 
* Development of the central banking system of ABS Equation. * Development of modules for the central banking system. 
* Programming IBM Power in the languages CL, RPG, CPP, Java EE. 
* Work with DB2 database. 
* Using Agile and Continuous integration techniques.

Functional responsibilities: 
* Development of led screen management system (Verilog, Intel FCPGA, 2 * Gb Ethernet, DDR SDRAM, VGA capture, 24 bpp RGB module scan) 
* System tests; 
* Preparation for production. 
Achievements: 
* Project completed.
